model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User class represents whoever wants to connect to the website.
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Paolo D'Arienzo

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String mail,
            java.lang.String nomeUtente,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String nome,
            java.lang.String cognome,
            java.lang.String numeroTelefono,
            java.lang.String cittaDiResidenza,
            java.lang.String CF,
            TipoCliente tipoCliente,
            java.lang.String numeroCellulare)
        Constructor of the User.
        Parameters:
        mail - is the e-mail of the user
        nomeUtente - is the nickname of the user
        password - stores the encrypted password of the user
        nome - is the name of the user
        cognome - is the surname of the user
        numeroTelefono - is the telephone number of the user
        cittaDiResidenza - is the city in which resides the user
        CF - is the fiscal code of the user
        tipoCliente - indicates the type of user
        numeroCellulare - is the private telephone number of the user

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String mail,
            java.lang.String nomeUtente,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String nome,
            java.lang.String cognome,
            java.lang.String numeroTelefono,
            java.lang.String cittaDiResidenza,
            java.lang.String CF)
        Constructor of the User where neither numeroCellulare nor tipoCliente are specified. tipoCliente is set to OCCASIONALE.
        Parameters:
        mail - is the e-mail of the user
        nomeUtente - is the nickname of the user
        password - stores the encrypted password of the user
        nome - is the name of the user
        cognome - is the surname of the user
        numeroTelefono - is the telephone number of the user
        cittaDiResidenza - is the city in which resides the user
        CF - is the fiscal code of the user

        Throws:

      • confirmPurchase

        public void confirmPurchase(Payment pagamento,
                            MetodoDiConsegna metodoDiConsegna,
                            DeliveryPoint puntoDiConsegna,
                            java.lang.String host)
                     throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Creates a new purchase and adds it in the user's purchase list
        Parameters:
        pagamento - is the purchase that has to be added
        metodoDiConsegna - is the delivery method chosen by the user
        puntoDiConsegna - is the delivery point chosen by the user
        host - IP address of the client
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - when is not possible to determine the IP address
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if an error occurs with the connection to the database
